roleset.name: make two things less similar

role.descr: entity arg 1 is made less similar from

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Created due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. Verbnet class separate-23.1-1. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: become dissimilar
example.text: These two related tribes of people gradually dissimilated over time.
example.arg: These two related tribes of people

example.name: linguistic dissimilation
example.text: The second -b- in the case ending had dissimilated.
example.arg: The second -b- in the case ending
